title: Some Players In This Game Make Me LoL So Hard
body:
The guys that talks shit, while going 1/16.
I give it right back, all game long (because I've been drinking), but I'm 12/5/33 (highest kill participation in game, despite me spending half the game chatting).

Then after the game, I see the guy is level 170! His entire match history is from the last 24 hours. He plays all day every day and is still terrible, not to mention really bad at in-game banter. I thought I played plenty of LoL, and I'm only level 68.

Has this guy ever seen the light of day? Does he even know what a female is? I have so many questions, but he won't accept my friend request.
So much 'get a life', or at least learn how to play.

If I did something all day, every day, and was terrible at it, I'd find something else to do...
Like, I play a lot of music (guitar and other instruments), but I'm actually good (other people tell me so), so it's worthwhile.

I almost feel compelled to report this guy (not to Riot, but to Social Services), so he can get an intervention.

Made my day.

replies.body: Maybe you were abit too drunk

I see his Mach history and the 6th game down is from 2 days ago 24 hours plus. 20th game 4 days ago. 

Rofl nice

You have the wrong guy.

Yea a lot of people are strange like that
